title: My game wont load what so ever
body: I really was hype to play this game for the first time but upon clicking the launcher i get some sort of PVP.NET error. I checked my League folder and i dont have ANY thing that says (.exe) Or even a launcher folder. I dont really know what the problem is with my down-loader but it wont install the necessary things. Any help is greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's possible your antivirus might be deleting some of the necessary files, could you try disabling it temporarily and reinstalling the game.
